channel.title: Closed,completed
channel.description:
ok well i had put the ; in and i had gotten 5 errors. i need to know what caused the error. if u would help fiz the code that would be nice also but can someone tell me whats wrong here
.\client.java:9069: cannot find symbol symbol : method setSkillXP(int,int,int) location: class client setSkillXP(0, j, playerXP[j]); ^ .\client.java:9070: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timesDone location: class client timesDone += 1; ^ .\client.java:9072: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("GOOD LUCK IN THE NEXT LIFE."); ^ .\client.java:9073: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timesDone location: class client yell(playerName+" has rebirthed "+timesDone+" times."); ^ .\client.java:9074: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client } else { sendMessage("All your skills must be 99."); } ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Closed,completed
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

  1. you never declared the ‘timesDone’ variable, do so under the class declaration, i.e:
public class client extends ...
{
...
  1. Delta uses ‘sM’ rather than ‘sendMessage’, and apparently something else for the setSkillXp method too. Look around for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed,completed
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

ok heres the command and the error is from this command
if(command.startsWith(“rebirth”)) {
for(int j=0; j<21; j++)
if(playerLevel[j] >= 99) {
setSkillXP(0, j, playerXP[j])
timesDone += 1;
showInterface(3559);
sendMessage(“GOOD LUCK IN THE NEXT LIFE.”);
yell(playerName+" has rebirthed “+timesDone+” times.");
} else { sendMessage(“All your skills must be 99.”); }
}

and here is the error i get

.\client.java:9069: ‘;’ expected
setSkillXP(0, j, playerXP[j])
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
